Global

Methods

jsdoc( [config], done)

A wrapper around jsdoc cli.

This function collects all filenames. Then runs: jsdoc -c config -t node_modules/ink-docstrap/template gulpFile1 gulpFile2

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
config Object <optional>
 require('./jsdocConfig.json')
done gulpDoneCallback
Returns:
Type
* | SignalBinding
Example
gulp.src(['README.md', 'src/*.js']), {read: false}).pipe(
    jsdoc(options, cb)
);

Type Definitions

gulpDoneCallback()
